basics.name: Rubén Maté Iturriaga
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: As a committed Software Engineering graduate, I have a deep passion for coding and love to tinker with tools, especially through the command-line interface. My interests mostly lie in web development, where I have mastered my skills and best practices to provide strong, effective, and scalable solutions. I really enjoy solving difficult problems and constantly strive to increase my knowledge and competencies.

work.name: Implemental Systems
highlights: Frontend development with React, using Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Next UI, and Shadcn UI
Backend development with Express.js and Spring Boot
Experience in deploying applications and infrastructure using Docker
Three.js for rendering GIS objects in 3D
OpenLayers and Leaflet for interactive mapping
work.summary: Working on both frontend and backend web development, with a strong emphasis on creating GIS systems based on the web environment. On the frontend, I've utilized technologies such as React, Three.js, Leaflet, and OpenLayers. For backend development, I've worked with Express and Spring Boot. Additionally, I have experience deploying applications and infrastructure using Docker.

education.summary: I began my degree in Software Engineering in 2013, dedicating three years to my studies. In 2016, I decided to pause my academic journey to prepare for the National Police entrance exam. After several years of preparation, I chose to return to my true passion and resumed my studies in 2022-2023.
